titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
svasti śrī tribhuvanaccakravatti kōnēriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ tiruk -e
kāṭuṅkuṉṟattu uṭaiyār nalla maṅkai pākar kōyil pra
ti pāta mūlap paṭṭuṭai pañcācāriyat tēvakaṉmikaḷukku taṅkaḷ nāyaṉā
rkku āṟkāṭu kiḻāṉ tiruveṇkā ṭuṭaiyā nāṉa vāṇādhirāyar kaṭṭiṉa
vacantaṉ tirunāḷukku amutupaṭi cāttuppaṭi uḷḷiṭṭu vēṇṭum nitta niman
taṅkaḷukkum nayamap paṟṟil kaṟaiykuṭiyāṉa vāṇarāyanallūr nā
ṭṭu maricāti muṉpilāṇṭukaḷum upāti vaṭṭamum ippaṟṟil ko
cuvantaraṅkaḷum viṭṭa āṇṭu oṉṟukku ye ttuppotum irāci
poṉ irunūṟum oṉpatāvatu vaiykāci mātam mutal mutalaṭaṅ
ka iṟaiyiliyāka innāṭṭil nicceyippile kaḻittu ivvūr kā
rum maṟuvum oru pūvum varampum karumpu ceṅkaḻinir koḻuntu vā
ḻai mañcaḷ iñci teṅku kamuku māp palā parutti āmaṇak
ku uḷḷiṭṭut tāṉ vēṇṭum payiṟ ceytum ceyvittum ko
ṇṭu ivvūrāl varum kaṭamai antarāyam poṉvari viṉi
yōkam māvaṭai puṉpayir āyavaṟkam kāttikaip
poṉ kāttikai paccai piḷḷaiyār nōṉput tēvai āṇ
ṭeḻuttu tēvai āṉai cārval kutiraip panti pañcupili can
tu vikkiṟakam ōlaiyeḻuttu viṉiyōkam ōlai yeṭuppu vi
ṉiyōka vācal viṉiyōkam iṟaiyaccu ko
ṟṟilakkai kaṭaikkūṭṭu ilakkai taṟiiṟai ce
kkiṟai taṭṭoli taṭṭārppāṭṭam ivvūril paḻantēvatā
ṉam tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam ma tta iṟaiyili nīṅkalāka niṉ
ṟa nilattukku ēri vari iṉavari vācalvari kāraṭai kuḷavaṭai o
ḻukkunīrpāṭṭam ṭima mōr pāṭ
ṭam uṭpaṭṭa aṉaittu upātikaḷum uṭpaṭat taṅkaḷ nā
yaṉārkku vāṇātarāyar (kaṭṭiṉa) vacantaṉ tirunā ḷuḷḷiṭ
ṭa pala tēvai(kaḷukkum) oṉṟāvatu vaikāci māta mutal
mayāka āṇṭu oṉ kaṭamaiyāka āṇṭu oṉṟu
kku irā nā ku attiyaṉam paṇṇa kārampice
tava paṭṭa ṉṟukku irāci poṉ āṟum āka
va po ya ppāḷar ka variyilār kaṇakkilum
ṉṉo lai piṭipā cantirātittavaṟ cellak kallilum
ṭṭu āṇṭu ivvūruḷ ruccūlattāpaṉam pa
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Review and updates (based on photos by N. Ramaswamy), encoding, critical apparatus and translation by Emmanuel Francis (2024).
